column2: ENGLISH
A Vampire Clan has taken root in §Y[Root.GetName]§! leading to severe unrest amongst the local populace.
Damn!
A pack of werewolves have entered §Y[Root.GetName]§!, they terrorise the local populace each night leading to unrest and disruption of the local economy.
A large number of Kikimoras settled in the swamps near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
Hellhounds are haunting the countryside near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
A large number of Rotfiends appeared near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
Drowners have infected the lakes and rivers near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
A large number of Nekkers appeared in the caves near §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
The Rain is continuing in [Root.GetName] and we haven't seen a blue sky for weeks. We need sufficient rain for our fields, but excessive rain will cause a bad crop in coming autumn.
We pray [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] against rain.
The weather in [Root.GetName] is extremely cold in this year. A cool summer is welcome, however poor people are dying at cold and peasants begin to worry about their crops in autumn.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], please help us!
Because of bad weathers or [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] work, the crops in [Root.GetName] is terrible in this year. We have to prepare the coming food shortage.
Let's hope that we can survive this winter.
Thanks for the protection of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], we have good crops in [Root.GetName]. We can hold a great harvest feast in this year!
We have no worry about this winter.

The bad crops brought a serious famine in [Root.GetName]! There is nothing to eat and the peasants sell their family as slave. They might be still happier than the people who have been dead at hungry.
Buy foods and help poor peasants and citizens!
Let them eat cake!
